TopicTitle: Can you download mods for Kerbal Space Program Demo?

Articles.Content: Can you download any mods for KSP Demo? Post in the comments below:
No, Mods are not supported in the Demo. If you want mods you must buy the game.

0.18.3? No. In principle, sufficiently old parts packs work with 0.7.3 - 0.13.3 (if you can find copies), but... why?

Post in the comments below:

As opposed to...?
If you've invested enough time in KSP to be interested in mods, you really should buy the full game. Much better...well, everything.
The demo doesn't have the ability to use addons, the most you can do is completely swap out a part for another one, but even then it's not designed to work so probably won't.
KSP is still a little bit on sale at the Humble Store. Only like $20 instead of $27.

Demo is not moddable.

Demo is based on version .18

Do yourself a favor, BUY it.

The current game has evolved so much, one could virtually say it is merely "based on" or "inspired by" the .18 version.
I actually have the real game, I was just wondering.
And, you are limited to flying to Mun as well as you are only allowed to have three flights at one time.
